title: Want to Get Angst Out of Your System WITHOUT Flaming?
body:
There is this cool site that I can't link directly to, for fear of breaking any forum advertising rules, called Debate.  As far as URL suffixes go, think of the "organizations".  It's absolutely free, a great way to blow off steam (and Steam), and it's a great way to stay in shape! 


 {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body:
We wouldn’t delete this for linking to debate.org. It’s loosely related to player behavior, if anything. 

I’d think continuing to sit at the computer would be an ineffective way to blow off steam. I would think exercise and/or getting away from League may be better for blowing off steam.

To each his own I suppose. I need a place to rant and this forum has no such board. 

"Twitter is stupid...." - Kat Dennings, 2 Broke Girls (and Facebook is all coworkers, family, and my bosses)

My kind of humor with that title would have been: 

Want to get angst out of your system?

Beat your wife! 

Ive been on reddit for too long....
